title: Paint Night
description:
Serenity at its best. Come relax and enjoy some creative time with friends while painting this brilliant sunset. Imagine the cool evenings of fall as we guide you step-by-step through this painting. The boat and cattails are pre-drawn for you on the canvas so all you have to do is relax and paint. Your ticket includes all materials necessary to create a 16 x 20-inch painting in this 2-hour event. Beginners welcome! No experience necessary! Space is limited so reserve your seat now!

title: Speed Dating
description:
Join us for a fun night of meeting some new people! Send us an email or stop in to sign up!

See Facebook Event

title: Ignite Backstage Pass
description:
Come check out the new bar in Amherst, The Local Goat Company! Owners Tiffany Gile and Tammy Carlson will give a tour and share the history of how the business came to be. Our own Ignite Board Member, Amanda Ross, will lead the Mimosas and Yoga class. After yoga, unwind with pizza from Angelo's Pizza and drinks from The Local Goat Company! The goats will also be onsite that evening.

For Mimosas and Yoga: -Bring your own yoga mat or rent one from The Local Goat Company for $1 -Dress in comfortable, activewear

Appetizers will be provided by Ignite. Full cash bar will be available. The event is $5 for Ignite Members and $10 for non-members

Event Timeline -6:00-6:45: welcome, and Mimosa Yoga -6:45/7:00 - 8:00: Tour of the Local Goat Company, Pizza from Angelo's Pizza, and Networking

Thank you to the UWSP MBA Program for being our Ignite Fuel Sponsor!

title: Pancakes, Packers, and Pajamas!
description:
Come join us and start off your Sunday morning with some mimosas, bloodies, pancakes, and Packers!!!

title: Chess Tournament
description:
Double elimination chess tournament. Timed games based on number of participants. $15 entry fee, $10 is for prize pool and $5 goes towards any drink at the bar. Sign up at the bar or email: info@thelocalgoatcompany.com

title: Craft Night: Paint for the Holidays
description:
Come enjoy a drink and paint a cute door hanger to start the holidays off right!

See Facebook Event

title: Let's Paint Events at The Local Goat
description:
A guided painting. A great night out. Let's Paint Events is all about getting creative, laughing, and having fun. Come and enjoy some time to get creative with friends and paint this stunning Starry Night scene. We will use a blow dryer to move paint around the canvas, salt, brushes, paper towels, and napkins to paint this amazing scene. You won't want to miss a crazy-good time! Your ticket includes a 16 x 20-inch canvas and supplies to produce a finished painting in this 2 hour class with step-by-step instructions. Beginners welcome! No experience is needed. Space is limited so reserve your seat now!

title: Singles Night
